subject: Speed Skating
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: J. R. Celski of the United States won the 3,000-meter title and finished third in the 1,000 at the short-track speedskating world championships in Vienna. Lee Ho-suk of South Korea won the 1,000 in 1 minute 33.06 seconds, ahead of Apolo Anton Ohno, who finished in 1:33.26.
snippet: J. R. Celski of the United States won the 3,000-meter title and finished third in the 1,000 at the short-track speedskating world championships in Vienna. Lee Ho-suk of South Korea won the 1,000 in 1 minute 33.06 seconds, ahead of Apolo Anton Ohno,...
